entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
